name: Magnolia
description: Magnolia is the world's premier composable digital experience platform. With over 450 enterprise customers and thousands of Community Edition deployments globally, it integrates seamlessly with diverse tech stacks. Trusted by industry leaders like American Express and CNN, Magnolia ensures personalized, optimized customer experiences across sectors from banking to media.

enhanced_description: Magnolia is the world's premier composable digital experience platform (DXP) designed to unify content and data sources for streamlined digital delivery and personalized customer experiences. It offers a user-friendly interface with an intuitive editor, supporting in-line editing, drag-and-drop components, and omnichannel preview. While serving a broad range of industries from banking to media, Magnolia also provides capabilities relevant to HR technology, specifically supporting hiring automation and contributing to objectives like hiring top talent faster and more efficiently. Trusted by industry leaders such as American Express and CNN, Magnolia integrates seamlessly with diverse tech stacks and enables content reuse across hundreds of brand sites and channels globally without duplication. Key features include Forms & Marketing Automation, Single-Page App (SPA) Editing, and Optimized Content Authoring via its Stories App.
